thread.title: Li Ka-shing Defends Business Strategy
thread.title_full: Li Ka-shing Defends Business Strategy - WSJ

author: Wayne Ma
title: Li Ka-shing Defends Business Strategy
text:
Hong Kong tycoon Li Ka-shing defended his business strategy in China Tuesday after articles in Chinese media accused him of abandoning investment in the country and called into question his patriotism for the mainland.
“(Chinese President Xi Jinping) has on many occasions stressed that China will stay committed to the path of reforms and opening up,” Mr. Li’s flagship company, CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd., said in a statement. “We are vigilant not to let these unfounded allegations escalate to cause investors’ concerns and...
